endpoint.description: The Hetzner Cloud API endpoint, can be used to override the default API Endpoint https://api.hetzner.cloud/v1.

endpoint_hetzner.description: The Hetzner API endpoint, can be used to override the default API Endpoint https://api.hetzner.com/v1.

poll_function.description: The type of function to be used during the polling.

poll_interval.description: The interval at which actions are polled by the client. Default `500ms`. Increase this interval if you run into rate limiting errors.

token.description: The Hetzner Cloud API token, can also be specified with the HCLOUD_TOKEN environment variable.

enable_public_interface.description: Wether the Load Balancer public interface is enabled. Default is `true`.

ip.description: IP to assign to the Load Balancer.

network_id.description: ID of the Network to attach the Load Balancer to. Using `subnet_id` is preferred. Required if `subnet_id` is not set. If `subnet_id` or `ip` are not set, the Load Balancer will be attached to the last subnet (ordered by `ip_range`).

subnet_id.description: ID of the Subnet to attach the Load Balancer to. Required if `network_id` is not set.

block.description: Manage the attachment of a Load Balancer in a Network in the Hetzner Cloud.

expose_routes_to_vswitch.description: Enable or disable exposing the routes to the vSwitch connection. The exposing only takes effect if a vSwitch connection is active.

alias_ips.description: Additional IPs to assign to the Server.

ip.description: IP to assign to the Server.

mac_address.description: MAC address of the Server on the Network.

network_id.description: ID of the Network to attach the Server to. Using `subnet_id` is preferred. Required if `subnet_id` is not set. If `subnet_id` or `ip` are not set, the Server will be attached to the last subnet (ordered by `ip_range`).

subnet_id.description: ID of the Subnet to attach the Server to. Required if `network_id` is not set.

block.description: Manage the attachment of a Server in a Network in the Hetzner Cloud.

fingerprint.description: Fingerprint of the SSH public key.

public_key.description: Public key of the SSH Key pair. If this is a file, it can be read using the `file` interpolation function.

block.description: Provides a Hetzner Cloud SSH Key resource to manage SSH Keys for server access.

reachable_externally.description: Whether access from outside the Hetzner network is allowed.

samba_enabled.description: Whether the Samba subsystem is enabled.

ssh_enabled.description: Whether the SSH subsystem is enabled.

webdav_enabled.description: Whether the WebDAV subsystem is enabled.

zfs_enabled.description: Whether the ZFS snapshot folder is visible.

access_settings.description: Access settings of the Storage Box.

delete_protection.description: Prevent the Storage Box from being accidentally deleted outside of Terraform.

password.description: Password of the Storage Box. For more details, see the [Storage Boxes password policy](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/hetzner#storage-boxes-password-policy).

day_of_month.description: Day of the month when the Snapshot Plan is executed. Null means every day.

day_of_week.description: Day of the week when the Snapshot Plan is executed. Starts at 0 for Sunday til 6 for Saturday. Note that this differs from the API, which uses 1 (Monday) through 7 (Sunday). Null means every day.

hour.description: Hour when the Snapshot Plan is executed (UTC).

max_snapshots.description: Maximum amount of Snapshots that will be created by this Snapshot Plan. Older Snapshots will be deleted.

minute.description: Minute when the Snapshot Plan is executed (UTC).

snapshot_plan.description: Details of the active snapshot plan.

ssh_keys.description: SSH public keys in OpenSSH format to inject into the Storage Box. It is not possible to update the SSH Keys through the API, so changing this attribute forces a replace of the Storage Box.

storage_box_type.description: Name of the Storage Box Type.

system.description: Host system of the Storage Box.

username.description: Primary username of the Storage Box.

block.description:
Provides a Hetzner Storage Box resource.

See the [Storage Box API documentation](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/hetzner#storage-boxes) for more details.

**Experimental:** Storage Box support is experimental, breaking changes may occur within minor releases.
See https://github.com/hetznercloud/terraform-provider-hcloud/issues/1285 for more details.

description.description: Description of the Storage Box Snapshot.

id.description: ID of the Storage Box Snapshot.

is_automatic.description: Whether the Storage Box Snapshot was created automatically.

name.description: Name of the Storage Box Snapshot.

samba_enabled.description: Whether the Samba subsystem is enabled.

ssh_enabled.description: Whether the SSH subsystem is enabled.

webdav_enabled.description: Whether the WebDAV subsystem is enabled.

description.description: A description of the Storage Box Subaccount.

home_directory.description: Home directory of the Storage Box Subaccount. The directory will be created if it doesn't exist yet.

id.description: ID of the Storage Box Subaccount.

name.description: Name of the Storage Box Subaccount.

password.description: Password of the Storage Box. For more details, see the [Storage Boxes password policy](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/hetzner#storage-boxes-password-policy).

username.description: Username of the Storage Box Subaccount.

assigned.description: Authoritative Hetzner nameservers assigned to the Zone.

address.description: Public IPv4 or IPv6 address of the primary nameserver.

tsig_algorithm.description: Transaction signature (TSIG) algorithm used to generate the TSIG key.

primary_nameservers.description: Primary nameservers of the Zone. Forbidden when mode is primary and required when mode is secondary.

ttl.description: Default Time To Live (TTL) of the Zone.

block.description:
Provides a Hetzner Cloud Zone resource.

This can be used to create, modify, and delete Zones.

For Internationalized domain names (IDN), see the `provider::hcloud::idna` function.

See the [Zones API documentation](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/cloud#zones) for more details.

ttl.description: Time To Live (TTL) of the Zone RRSet.

zone.description: ID or Name of the parent Zone.

block.description:
Provides a Hetzner Cloud Zone Resource Record Set (RRSet) resource.

This can be used to create, modify, and delete Zone RRSets.

See the [Zone RRSets API documentation](https://docs.hetzner.cloud/reference/cloud#zone-rrsets) for more details.

**RRSets of type TXT:**

The format of TXT records must consist of one or many quoted strings of 255 characters.

A helper function to format TXT record is available at `provider::hcloud::txt_record`.
See the examples for more details.

**RRSets of type SOA:**

SOA records are created or deleted by the Hetzner Cloud API when creating or deleting
the parent Zone, therefor this Terraform resource will:

- import the RRSet in the state, instead of creating it.
- remove the RRSet from the state, instead of deleting it.
- set the SOA record SERIAL value to 0 before saving it to the state, as this value is automatically
  incremented by the API and would cause issues otherwise.

available_server_type_ids.description: List of currently available Server Types in the Datacenter.

location.description: Location of the Datacenter. See the [Hetzner Docs](https://docs.hetzner.com/cloud/general/locations/#what-locations-are-there) for more details about locations.

supported_server_type_ids.description: List of supported Server Types in the Datacenter.

block.description:
Provides details about a specific Hetzner Cloud Datacenter.

Use this resource to get detailed information about a specific Datacenter.

available_server_type_ids.description: List of currently available Server Types in the Datacenter.

location.description: Location of the Datacenter. See the [Hetzner Docs](https://docs.hetzner.com/cloud/general/locations/#what-locations-are-there) for more details about locations.

supported_server_type_ids.description: List of supported Server Types in the Datacenter.

block.description:
Provides a list of available Hetzner Cloud Datacenters.

This resource may be useful to create highly available infrastructure, distributed across several Datacenters.

description.description: Description of the Load Balancer Type.

id.description: ID of the Load Balancer Type.

max_assigned_certificates.description: Maximum number of certificates that can be assigned for the Load Balancer of this type.

max_connections.description: Maximum number of simultaneous open connections for the Load Balancer of this type.

max_services.description: Maximum number of services for the Load Balancer of this type.

max_targets.description: Maximum number of targets for the Load Balancer of this type.

name.description: Name of the Load Balancer Type.

city.description: Name of the closest city to the Location. City name and optionally state in short form.

country.description: Country the Location resides in. ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the country.

latitude.description: Latitude of the city closest to the Location.

longitude.description: Longitude of the city closest to the Location.

network_zone.description: Name of the Network Zone this Location resides in.
